name: citf
body:

CREATE FUNCTION <Schema Name, SYSNAME, dbo>.<Function Name, SYSNAME, FunctionName>(
	-- @ParameterName AS DataType [ = DefaultValue ]
) RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
	-- Return the result of the function
	$SELECTIONSTART$SELECT ColumnName = 1;$SELECTIONEND$
GO
